Translations.Text: ratranta (namaj lo) nilabadu, konta bhaganni vidici
dani sagabhaganlo, leda dani kante konta takkuva
leda dani kante konta ekkuva; mariyu khur'an nu agi agi nem'madiga spastanga pathincu
niscayanga, memu nipai bharamaina sandesanni avatarimpa jeyabotunnamu
niscayanga, ratrivela levatam (manas'sunu) adupulo uncukovataniki ento upayuktamainadi mariyu (allah) pravacanalanu (artham cesukovataniki) kuda ento anuganamainadi
mariyu nivu ni prabhuvu namanni smaristu undu. Mariyu atyanta sradthato ayana vaipuku maralutu undu
ayane turpu padamarala svami, ayana tappa maroka aradhya daivam ledu, kavuna nivu ayanane karyakartaga cesuko
Mariyu varu palike matalaku sahanam vahincu mariyu mancitananto vari nundi tolagipo
mariyu asatyavadulaina i sampannulanu, naku vadalipettu. Mariyu variki konta vyavadhinivvu
niscayanga, ma vadda vari koraku sankellu mariyu bhagabhagamande narakagni unnayi
mariyu gontulo irukkupoye aharam mariyu badhakaramaina siksa (unnayi)
a roju bhumi mariyu parvatalu kampinci potayi. Mariyu parvatalu pravahince isuka dibbaluga maripotayi
memu phir'aun vaddaku sandesaharunni pampinatlu, niscayanga mi vaddaku kuda oka sandesaharunni, miku saksiga undataniki pampamu
kani phir'aun a sandesaharuniki avidheyata cupadu. Kavuna memu atanini tivramaina siksaku guri cesamu
okavela miru satyanni tiraskariste, baluranu musalivariga cesetatu vanti a dinapu siksa nundi ela tappincukogalaru
appudu akasam braddalai potundi. Ayana yokka vagdanam tappaka neraveri tirutundi
niscayanga, idoka upadesam kavuna istamaina vadu tana prabhuvu vaddaku poye marganni avalambincavaccu
